page.title: 19The Survey And Work
page.content:
The survey showed that most people travel to work, out of 256 answers 9% work at home. Of the rest:-
Less than 2 miles............ 7% 2 miles to 10 miles.........28% 11 miles to 30 miles.........30% 31 miles to 50 miles.........22% 51 miles to 100 miles........13%
We tried not to include people who travelled AS their work. We failed to ask a question that would show how many mothers or fathers stayed at home to care for families, and so felt we had to exclude those few who actually said they did, or put "Housewife". A staggering 72% of firms were LONDON based . In view of this it was very surprising to learn that only 28% used public transport to go to work.
